overview_of_class: This course focuses on relationships and communication processes, or how communication serves to construct and sustain relational ties across time. It provides an overview of interpersonal theories and concepts that provide insight into the patterns and changes of relational systems over time.
name: Theories of Relational Communication
title: SoC COMM_ST 241-0-20 Theories of Relational Communication

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course focuses on relationships and communication processes, or how communication serves to construct and sustain relational ties across time. It provides an overview of interpersonal theories and concepts that provide insight into the patterns and changes of relational systems over time.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: West, R & Turner, L. Theories of Relational Communication. 5th ed. McGraw -Hill

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

No Freshmen

Undergraduate Students Only
subject: COMM_ST
